required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase I Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics ，Pharmacodynamics of Oral SHR2150 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics, Pharmacodynamics of Oral SHR2150 in Healthy Subjects With Single Dose of SHR2150 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The study is a randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled study to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics of SHR2150.
will consist of 50 healthy subjects, 5 groups. The purpose of this part is to explore the safety, tolerability ,pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of single doses of SHR2150 capsule in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameters of SHR2150, , main metabolite and identified major metabolites in plasma ：[AUC0-last]
secondary_outcome.description: The area under the concentration-time curve from time zero (pre-dose) to last time.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameters of SHR2150, , main metabolite and identified major metabolites in plasma ： [AUC0-∞]
secondary_outcome.description: The area under the concentration-time curve from time zero (pre-dose) extrapolated to infinite time.

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameters of SHR2150, , main metabolite and identified major metabolites in plasma ：[t1/2]
Pharmacokinetic parameters of SHR2150, , main metabolite and identified major metabolites in plasma： [Tmax]
Pharmacokinetic parameters of SHR2150, , main metabolite and identified major metabolites in plasma ： [Cmax]
Pharmacokinetic parameters of SHR2150, , main metabolite and identified major metabolites in plasma ： [CL/F]
Pharmacokinetic parameters of SHR2150, , main metabolite and identified major metabolites in plasma ： [Vz/F]
Pharmacokinetic parameters of SHR2150, , main metabolite and identified major metabolites in plasma ： [MRT]
Pharmacodynamics: Changes in Cytokines in Serum: interferon γ-inducible protein-10
Pharmacodynamics: Changes in Cytokines in Serum: Interferon-α
